name: Animal Wrath
description:
The animals are running out of space to live because of the humans and their forest-killing machines. Help them get the forest back from the humans… with the power of the giant animals! Tall as a building and strong as a bore!

Made with Unity for Ludum Dare 42. Music made with Renoise.

Assets used :

Free Low Poly Pack by BROKEN VECTOR 

ANIMALS PACK lowPoly by GBANDREWGB

[M]Lowpoly Cars by MEOWINGMAMMOTH
